column1: Kata Robata////Without a doubt in my mind
column2: Kata Robata has to be one of my favorite sushi restaurants in Houston. (Of course
column4: but Kata Robata is up there). Whether it's a birthday celebration
column6: or some crazy boy drama you need to drown out
column7: or an insatiable desire for ramen
column8: my friends and I always resort to Kata Robata. They have an excellent menu
column9: great quality of food and amazing ambiance.
